/**
 * DictionaryButton.js
 * 
 * Purpose: This component renders a button that opens a modal containing a dictionary
 *          of Mi'kmaq words and their English meanings. The button is styled and positioned
 *          on the page, and clicking it opens the dictionary in a modal.
 * 
 * Author: Tooba Javed (A00468904)
 */import React,{useState}from'react';import DictionaryModal from'./DictionaryModal';import DictionaryImage from'./images/DictionaryImage.png';/**
 * DictionaryButton Component
 * 
 * Purpose: Renders a button labeled "Dictionary" that, when clicked, opens a modal displaying
 *          Mi'kmaq words with English translations.
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DictionaryButton=()=>{// State variable to control the visibility of the dictionary modal
const[isModalOpen,setIsModalOpen]=useState(false);/**
   * openModal Function
   * 
   * Purpose: Sets the state to open the modal by setting isModalOpen to true.
   */const openModal=()=>{setIsModalOpen(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"Mobile-View flew lg:hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{//ID for locating the button on the mobile view
"data-cy":"dictionary-button-mobile",className:"w-[30vw] h-[7vh] bg-teal-600 text-gray-300 border border-teal-700 rounded-lg mt-0 shadow-sm hover:bg-teal-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-teal-800  transition-all font-comic flex items-center justify-center",onClick:openModal,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:DictionaryImage,className:"h-[6vh]",alt:"Dictionary"})}),isModalOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DictionaryModal,{closeModal:()=>setIsModalOpen(false)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"Dektop-View hidden lg:flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{//ID for locating the button on the desktop view
"data-cy":"dictionary-button-desktop",className:"w-[8vw] bg-teal-600 text-gray-300 border border-teal-700 rounded-lg py-2 px-3  shadow-sm hover:bg-teal-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-teal-800  transition-all font-comic flex items-center justify-center",onClick:openModal,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:DictionaryImage,className:"h-[5vh]",alt:"Dictionary"})}),isModalOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DictionaryModal,{closeModal:()=>setIsModalOpen(false)})]})]});};export default DictionaryButton;
